attributes.action: Stop parents claiming CSA/CMS if they refuse access to the other parent
attributes.additional_details:
It is illegal in other countries but seems to be allowed in this one

All I ask is for this to be reviewed 

Doesn't matter if its male or female stopping access, if their isn't anything legally stopping access then they shouldn't be allowed to claim
attributes.background: I can't understand why parents are allowed to claim child support / maintenance If there isn't anything legally stopping access, but do it anyway.
